trans-unit.source: Wraps an XSD <xref uid="langword_csharp_time" name="time" href=""></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula num wrapper um XSD <xref uid="langword_csharp_time" name="time" href=""> </xref> tipo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XSD data types, see "XML Data Types Reference" in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre os tipos de dados XSD, consulte "XML dados Types Reference" na biblioteca do MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime"></xref> class with a specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime"> </xref> classe com uma determinada <xref:System.DateTime>objeto.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object to initialize the current instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>objeto ao inicializar a instância atual.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o idioma de definição de esquema XML (XSD) do tipo SOAP atual.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que indica o XSD do tipo SOAP atual.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref:System.String> into a <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Converte especificado <xref:System.String>para um <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The Parse method is capable of parsing strings in the HH:mm:ss.fffzzz format.
trans-unit.target: O método de análise é capaz de análise cadeias no formato HH:mm:ss.fffzzz.

trans-unit.source: This is composed out of the following format patterns.
trans-unit.target: Isto é composto pelos fora os padrões de formato seguinte.

trans-unit.source: |Format Pattern|Description|Examples| |--------------------|-----------------|--------------| |HH|The hour within a 24-hour range.
trans-unit.target: | Formato de padrão | Descrição | Exemplos | |--------------------|-----------------|--------------| | HH | A hora dentro de um intervalo de 24 horas.

trans-unit.source: Single-digit hours have a leading zero.|17, 07| |mm|The minute.
trans-unit.target: Horas de dígito tem um zero à esquerda. | 17, 07 | | mm | O minuto.

trans-unit.source: Single-digit minutes have a leading zero.|49, 05| |ss|The second.
trans-unit.target: Minutos de dígito tem um zero à esquerda. | 49, 05 | | ss | O segundo.

trans-unit.source: Single-digit seconds have a leading zero.|32, 02| |fff|The fraction of a second.
trans-unit.target: Segundos de dígito tem um zero à esquerda. | 32, 02 | | fff | A fração de um segundo.

trans-unit.source: A maximum of 7 fraction digits are allowed, and only the first three are parsed.|321635, 4592| |zzz|The full time zone offset (hour and minutes) from the Universal Time Coordinate (Greenwich Mean Time).
trans-unit.target: Permitido um máximo de 7 dígitos de fração e apenas os primeiro três são analisadas. | 321635, 4592 | | zzz | O tempo inteiro desvio de fuso (hora e minutos) da hora Universal Coordenada (hora de Greenwich).

trans-unit.source: Single-digit hours have a leading zero.|-07:00, +08:00, Z| Only the first 3 fraction digits are parsed because the parsed value is stored as a <xref:System.DateTime> object, and the <xref:System.DateTime> type supports precisely 3 fraction digits of accuracy.
trans-unit.target: Horas de dígito tem um zero à esquerda. | -07: 00, +08: 00, Z | Apenas os dígitos de 3 fração primeiro são analisados porque o valor analisado é armazenado como uma <xref:System.DateTime>objeto e o <xref:System.DateTime>tipo suporta precisamente 3 fração dígitos de precisão.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to convert.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.String>converter.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A object that is obtained from value.
trans-unit.target: A objeto que é obtido a partir do value .

trans-unit.source: value does not contain a date and time that corresponds to any of the recognized format patterns.
trans-unit.target: valuenão contém uma data e hora que corresponde a nenhum dos padrões de formato reconhecido.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime.Value*> as a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime.Value*>como <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is obtained from <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime.Value*> in the format "HH:mm:ss.fffzzz".
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que é obtida a partir <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime.Value*>no formato "HH:mm:ss.fffzzz".</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime.Value*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date and time of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a data e hora da instância atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> object that contains the date and time of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DateTime>objeto que contém a data e hora da instância atual.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a linguagem de definição de esquema XML (XSD) do tipo SOAP atual.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que indica o XSD do tipo SOAP atual.</xref:System.String>
